scripts.test: npm run --silent lint && echo && echo 'No tests have been added!'
scripts.placeholders:watermark: ( cd ./public/resources/image/placeholder && convert before-original.jpg -background transparent -fill 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)' -font 'FreeSans' -pointsize 90 -gravity center -annotate 300x300+0+0 'SAMPLE' -strip before.jpg && convert after-original.jpg -background transparent -fill 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)' -font 'FreeSans' -pointsize 90 -gravity center -annotate 300x300+0+0 'SAMPLE' -strip after.jpg; )
scripts.lint: npm run --silent lint:xo && npm run --silent lint:prettier
scripts.lint:fix: npm run --silent lint:xo:fix && npm run --silent lint:prettier:fix
scripts.lint:prettier: prettier --list-different "./**/*.json" "./**/*.md" || { echo "Prettier needs to format the above files. Try 'npm run --silent lint:fix'." && exit 1; }
